name: HuestickÂ® Eye, Lip and Cheek Multistick
about: What it is:An ultra-creamy eye, lip, and cheek multi-stick..Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: Provides hydration..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This creamy, buildable formula paints your eyes, lips, and cheeks. It goes on like butter and has a demi-matte finish made for blending, so doing a full face has never been easier.
ingredients: Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Polyethylene, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Octyldodecanol, Mica, Sucrose Acetate Isobutyrate, Silica, Candelilla Cera/ Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/ Cire de candelilla, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Octyldodecyl Neopentanoate, Lecithin, Squalane, Lauroyl Lysine, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Tocopherol, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, HDI/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Aqua/Water/Eau, Propylene Carbonate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Tin Oxide, Caprylyl Glycol. May Contain (+/-):.Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Red 33 Lake (CI 17200), Red 40 Lake (CI 16035)..The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Swipe on eyes, cheeks, and lips for buildable, blendable color. .-Blend with fingers or your preferred tool.
